5386.verse: يُبَصَّرُونَهُمْ‌ۚ|They will be made to see each other.|268|306|17314$يَوَدُّ|Would wish|94|169|903$ٱلْمُجْرِمُ|the criminal|96|171|17315$لَوْ|if|41|79|905$يَفْتَدِى|he (could be) ransomed|177|188|17316$مِنْ|from|50|72|53$عَذَابِ|(the) punishment|134|156|1160$يَوْمِئِذِۭ|(of) that Day|108|130|8592$بِبَنِيهِ|by his children,|120|131|17317$

5390.verse: كَلَّآ‌ۖ|By no means!|109|181|11291$إِنَّهَا|Indeed, it (is)|111|256|666$لَظَىٰ|surely a Flame of Hell,|166|238|17322$

5402.verse: وَٱلَّذِينَ|And those who|119|128|42$هُم|[they]|62|79|49$مِّنْ|of|50|67|53$عَذَابِ|(the) punishment|134|151|1160$رَبِّهِم|(of) their Lord|113|130|54$مُّشْفِقُونَ|(are) fearful -|112|120|11764$

5403.verse: إِنَّ|Indeed,|70|85|58$عَذَابَ|(the) punishment|134|163|1786$رَبِّهِمْ|(of) your Lord|112|141|54$غَيْرُ|(is) not|69|98|4343$مَأْمُونٍ|to be felt secure (of) -|173|188|17334$

5407.verse: وَٱلَّذِينَ|And those who|119|134|42$هُمْ|[they]|62|92|49$لِأَمَـٰنَـٰتِهِمْ|of their trusts|112|142|12218$وَعَهْدِهِمْ|and their promise|134|164|12219$رَٲعُونَ|(are) observers,|127|142|12220$

5411.verse: فَمَالِ|So what is with|123|144|4221$ٱلَّذِينَ|those who|89|130|20$كَفَرُواْ|disbelieve,|89|130|59$قِبَلَكَ|before you|91|132|17337$مُهْطِعِينَ|(they) hasten,|117|138|9662$

5386.verse: They will be shown each other. The criminal will wish that he could be ransomed from the punishment of that Day by his children

5387.verse: And his wife and his brother

5388.verse: And his nearest kindred who shelter him

5389.verse: And whoever is on earth entirely [so] then it could save him.

5390.verse: No! Indeed, it is the Flame [of Hell],

5392.verse: It invites he who turned his back [on truth] and went away [from obedience]

5396.verse: And when good touches him, withholding [of it],

5398.verse: Those who are constant in their prayer

5399.verse: And those within whose wealth is a known right

5400.verse: For the petitioner and the deprived -

5401.verse: And those who believe in the Day of Recompense

5402.verse: And those who are fearful of the punishment of their Lord -

5403.verse: Indeed, the punishment of their Lord is not that from which one is safe -

5404.verse: And those who guard their private parts

5405.verse: Except from their wives or those their right hands possess, for indeed, they are not to be blamed -

5406.verse: But whoever seeks beyond that, then they are the transgressors -

5407.verse: And those who are to their trusts and promises attentive

5408.verse: And those who are in their testimonies upright

5409.verse: And those who [carefully] maintain their prayer:

5410.verse: They will be in gardens, honored.

5411.verse: So what is [the matter] with those who disbelieve, hastening [from] before you, [O Muhammad],

5412.verse: [To sit] on [your] right and [your] left in separate groups?

5413.verse: Does every person among them aspire to enter a garden of pleasure?

5414.verse: No! Indeed, We have created them from that which they know.
